query.statement:
SELECT '' AS CHK, CASE WHEN length(A.RDATE) > 0 AND VALUE(A.RDATE,'00000000') > 19990101 THEN '' ELSE 'X' END AS GBN , A.MANDT , A.CDATE , A.LIFNR , A.PSPID , A.IQNTY , A.INQTY , (SELECT X.ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.POSID = A.PSPID) AS ZSITE_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.POSID = A.PSPID AND X.ZZGUBUN IN ('11','12')) AS ZQNTY , A.OUTQTY , A.IPQTY , A.LOSQTY , A.BANQTY , A.RUQTY , A.RDATE , CASE WHEN A.RUQTY > 0 THEN 'Àç»ç¿ë'ELSE '' END AS REUSE, (SELECT X.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.USERNUMB = A.CNAME) AS CNAME , (SELECT P2.NAMET2 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS P2 WHERE P2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND P2.POSID = A.PSPID AND P2.ZZGUBUN IN ('11','12') FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS NAMET, (SELECT P2.NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS P2 WHERE P2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND P2.POSID = A.PSPID AND P2.ZZGUBUN IN ('11','12') FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS NAMET2, A.EDATE , A.ENAME , A.BIGO
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0113 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND A.CDATE BETWEEN #CDAT_F# AND #CDAT_T#
AND A.RDATE BETWEEN #RDAT_F# AND #RDAT_T#
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
ORDER BY A.CDATE ,A.PSPID FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
